name: Coding Projects
body:
[Senate Bill Web Scraper](https://github.com/bdm22/Senate-web-scraper/blob/master/web-scraper.py)

Web scraper and data visualization program. It scrapes voting records for individual senators in the US Senate, processes the data to figure out who each senator cosponsors bills with, and visualizes their connections in a chord chart.

[Koch Snowflake Fractal Generator](https://github.com/bdm22/Koch-fractal-Jupyter-notebook/blob/master/index.ipynb)

A weekend project that implements the Koch fractal algorithm to a chosen depth.  Iâ€™ve been reading through the book The _Nature of Code_ by Shiffman and wanted to take one of his challenge exercises for a spin

Interactive link (Click Fractal.ipynb; then Cell->Run All): 
[![Binder](http://mybinder.org/badge.svg)](http://mybinder.org:/repo/bdm22/koch-fractal-jupyter-notebook)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
